description.value: Body weight is the common name for (human) body mass.

purpose.value: A derived profile from [zib-BodyWeight](http://nictiz.nl/fhir/StructureDefinition/zib-BodyWeight) to provide a version better suited for implementation purposes. This profile augments the base profile with elements found in the various use cases that have adopted the zib.
